name: Risk.Speed.Impact.
description:
NOTE: 

A fast paced hover racer for the PC

This started out as a game jam project. Inspired by wipeout and f-zero, but please don't mistake that for a clone. Apart from a few design choices it is a very different style of game.

Game jam page - https://alxinc.itch.io/agd-tinyjam-submission-2022

You can check it out to see how far it's come if you want

Also, to note. To accelerate you will need to continually tap space. It's not called R.S.I. for nothing.

I have been creating this for about 2 months now and would like to share the current build. There is still a lot more to do and put in, but need to make sure that all the core mechanics are solid before committing to final art and levels etc.

If you play it and encounter any bugs, please let me know. Even if they're just quality of life kind of things
